name: Reverb Demo
description:
Reverb (demo)

This is a virtual reality rhythm shooter game built for the SteamVR platform. It is designed to dynamically generate levels to the user's MP3 or WAV files. Due to problems caused by the COVID-19 pandemic, I was unable to implement a VR user interface, so it uses a desktop main menu UI but features all gameplay in VR.

Honors Thesis

If anyone is interested, I also wrote an honors thesis that uses this game to examine the relationship that virtual reality creates with its perspective user and what needs to be done to innovate that relationship.
